extensionName.message: Sokuji - AI-powered Live Speech Translation for Online Meetings

extensionDescription.message: AI-powered instant speech translation for all video meetings. Break language barriers with real-time voice translation.

clickToStart.message: Click "Open Sokuji" below to start real-time translation.

quickStartInstructions.message: Configure your API key (OpenAI or Gemini) → Select "Sokuji_Virtual_Mic" as microphone → Start speaking!

currentlyOn.message: Currently on $HOSTNAME$. Sokuji works on these platforms:

refreshAndTry.message: Please refresh the page and try again.

gatherTownGuidance.message: Lai izmantotu Sokuji, lūdzu izvēlieties "Sokuji Virtual Microphone" mikrofona iestatījumos.

wherebyGuidance.message: Lai izmantotu Sokuji, lūdzu, izvēlieties "Sokuji Virtual Microphone" mikrofona iestatījumos un atspējojiet trokšņu samazināšanu labākai veiktspējai.

defaultGuidance.message: To use Sokuji, please select "Sokuji Virtual Microphone" in your microphone settings.

discordGuidance.message: To use Sokuji, please select "Sokuji Virtual Microphone" in your microphone settings and disable Noise Suppression in Discord's Voice settings for better performance.

slackGuidance.message: To use Sokuji in Slack Huddles, please start a Huddle, then select "Sokuji Virtual Microphone" in your Video and Mic settings, and disable Noise Suppression in Audio & Video preferences for better performance.

teamsGuidance.message:
Ja neredzat pilnu audio ierīču sarakstu Teams iestatījumos:
1) Īslaicīgi atspējojiet Sokuji paplašinājumu un atsvaidziniet lapu
2) Atļaujiet Teams piekļūt mikrofonam un kamerai, kad tiek lūgts
3) Vēlreiz iespējojiet Sokuji paplašinājumu un vēlreiz atsvaidziniet lapu
4) Atļaujiet Sokuji piekļūt mikrofonam, kad tiek lūgts. Tagad jums vajadzētu redzēt gan īstās ierīces, gan "Sokuji Virtual Microphone" iestatījumos.
